Package Model.Rules

Class UnoGameRules

java.lang.Object
Model.Rules.UnoGameRules
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassicRules, MemeRules, SevenoRules
public abstract class UnoGameRules extends Object
This class is used to model the possible rules a Uno game, more specifically the aspects the various game-modes can change.
The main aspects to define to be well-designed Uno rules are :
Setup
-the number of cards that can be played in a single turn
-the number of cards distributed to each player at the start
-the cards with which a deck is composed by
In game
-card playability
-game win condition
-card actions performances
-point scoring
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
